messages.author: Station Earnings Report
messages.body:
Sector Economic Report

Sector vendor prices is currently at 100%, but company countermeasures protect YOU from being affected!

The station spending power is currently 0 Credits, and the crew's targeted allowance is at 25 Credits.

That's all from the Nanotrasen Economist Division.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security level elevated.

The station has received reliable information about possible hostile activity on the station. Security staff may have weapons visible, random searches are permitted. A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

The station spending power is currently 550 Credits, and the crew's targeted allowance is at 300 Credits.

That's all from the Nanotrasen Economist Division.

messages.author: Station Earnings Report
messages.body:
Sector Economic Report

Sector vendor prices is currently at 180%, but company countermeasures protect YOU from being affected!

The station spending power is currently 600 Credits, and the crew's targeted allowance is at 325 Credits.

Large Drop! Aussec Armory has been hit with a major lawsuit, resulting in a price drop for bluespace crystal.
Selling like Hotcakes! SolGov , in a surprise move, monopolized supply and has raised the price of titanium.
Selling like Hotcakes! Aussec Armory , in a surprise move, monopolized supply and has raised the price of diamond.
Large Drop! SolGov has been hit with a major lawsuit, resulting in a price drop for diamond.
That's all from the Nanotrasen Economist Division.

messages.author: Station Earnings Report
messages.body:
Sector Economic Report

Sector vendor prices is currently at 190%, but company countermeasures protect YOU from being affected!

The station spending power is currently 650 Credits, and the crew's targeted allowance is at 350 Credits.

Market Reset! Nakamura Engineering has been rolled into a larger company, resetting the price of iron.
Selling like Hotcakes! Robust Industries, LLC is hitting it big! Dramatically stocking and raising the price of silver.
Selling like Hotcakes! Vey-Medical is hitting it big! Dramatically stocking and raising the price of silver.
Large Boost! Aussec Armory has just released a new product that raised the price of gold.
Large Drop! Dreamland Robotics has produced a report that lowered the price of glass.
Selling like Hotcakes! Nakamura Engineering has just released a new product that is dominating the market for gold.
That's all from the Nanotrasen Economist Division.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

All SMESs on Space Station 13 have been recharged. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to climate change, a number of [REDACTED] have stampeded into the maintenance tunnels.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Custodial Notification

Minor biological obstruction detected in the ventilation network. Blockage is believed to be in the Chapel Office.

messages.author: Nanotrasen Stock Report
messages.body:
Thank you for reading the Nanotrasen Stock Report. Due to quarterly earnings reports exceeding expectations by several percent, the Nanotrasen Incorporated stock has jumped 5%, one of the largest in months.

Originally published on: 9/26/2562
